data.text: Momfa ahurusi nto dwom mma Awurade, mo atreneefo,
Momfa sanku nkamfo Awurade;
Monto dwom foforo mma no.
Awurade asɛm teɛ na ɛyɛ nokware
Awurade dɔ treneeyɛ ne atɛntrenee.
Awurade asɛm so na wɔnam yɛɛ ɔsorosoro,
Ɔka po nsu boa ano kuw;
Momma asase sofo nyinaa nsuro Awurade;
Ɔno na ɔkasa ma ɛbaa mu
Awurade sɛe amanaman no nhyehyɛe;
Nanso Awurade nhyehyɛe tim hɔ daa,
Nhyira ne ɔman a ne Nyankopɔn ne Awurade,
Awurade hwɛ adesamma nyinaa fi ɔsoro.
Ofi nʼatenae hwɛ wɔn a wɔte asase so nyinaa.
Ɔno ne nea ɔbɔɔ wɔn nyinaa koma,
Ɛnyɛ ɔhene asraafo dɔm kɛse na ebegye no;
Ɔpɔnkɔ mu ahotoso yɛ ɔkwa wɔ nkwagye mu;
Nanso Awurade ani wɔ wɔn a wosuro no no so,
sɛ obegye wɔn afi owu mu
Yɛde anidaso twɛn Awurade;
Ne mu na yɛn koma di ahurusi,
Ma wʼadɔe a ɛnsa da no ntena yɛn so, Awurade,
